ygData.subject: Re:  What Sabra wears
ygData.msgSnippet: This is an interesting thread!  Here s what I wear at 50th: Ear: +4 str, +2 int earring (I don t use the obsidian bead hoops I have in the bank, but I keep
ygData.messageBody:
This is an interesting thread! Here's what I wear at 50th:

Ear: +4 str, +2 int earring (I don't use the obsidian bead hoops I have
in the bank, but I keep them because a good friend gave them to me)
Ear: same as above
Neck: golden black pearl choker (sometimes a +7 str, +7 int necklace)
Face: platinum ruby veil (sometimes a lizard tribal mask)
Head: black headband
Finger: Jagged Band
Finger: Jagged Band
Wrist: serpentine bracer
Wrist: serpentine bracer
Arm: Azure Sleeves
Hands: shiverback
Shoulders: Cured Silk
Chest: shiverback
Back: Cloak of Flames
Waist: Thick banded belt
Legs: Drake-hide leggings
Shoes: kobold hide boots (yes, the same boots I've worn since around 20th
level)

~~~Lady Sabra Stormspirit
Guild Leader, The Tempest Fates, Karana
